actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the Smithville Lake project, Little Platte River, Missouri, to establish a memorial to former Congressman Jerry L. Litton and redesignate the Smithville Lake project visitor center as the "Jerry L. Litton Memorial Visitor Center".

summary.text: Modifies the Smithville Lake project, Little Platte River, Missouri, to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to modify the project's visitor center to establish a memorial to Congressman Jerry L. Litton at an estimated cost of $1,200,000. Renames the visitor's center the "Jerry L. Litton Memorial Visitor Center".

titles.title: A bill to modify the Smithville Lake project, Little Platte River, Missouri, to establish a memorial to former Congressman Jerry L. Litton and redesignate the Smithville Lake project visitor center as the "Jerry L. Litton Memorial Visitor Center".
